Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 26th overall pick, by New York in 2016...
Traded from New York to Cincinnati on 2/3/2017 (Going to NY: 3B John Losey. Going to CIN: 1B Frederick Wansley, P Imotoku Kyoden, RF Jose Flores)...
Injured on 4/21/2017 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 4/28/2017 with a Bruised Jaw, out for 6 days...
Traded from Cincinnati to Brooklyn on 5/1/2018 (Going to BRO: P Imotoku Kyoden. Going to CIN: 1B Eloy Torre)...
Had first career hit (double) on 8/20/2019, off Charles Barney (NY)...
Earned first career win on 8/20/2019...
Injured on 5/19/2020 with a Ruptured Disc Back, out for full season...
Traded from Brooklyn to Cincinnati on 2/13/2021 (Going to CIN: P Marcelo Guzman, P Celso Resto, P Imotoku Kyoden. Going to BRO: P Fernando Cantu)...
Traded from Cincinnati to St. Louis (C) on 2/13/2021 (Going to CIN: RF Patricio Garza, 1B George Stebbins. Going to STL: P Imotoku Kyoden, P Zachary Pietrzak)...
Injured on 3/26/2021 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 5/30/2021 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Was selected to the 2023 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/6/2023 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2023...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,657,143 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2024 Allstar game...
1/31/2025: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,657,143 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2026: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,657,143 through salary arbitration...
10/12/2026: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis (C), $14,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
Won World Series with St. Louis (C) in 2027...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Colorado on 2/1/2028 (Going to STL: P Ronald Hosler, P Michael Landis, SS Johnny Pippin. Going to COL: P Imotoku Kyoden, P Arthur Heckstall, P Lazaro Sanchez, 2B Ado
